attributes.additional_details: my petition is for younger disabled children to have mobility CAR , the law age is 3 years old which i find to be Unhelpful , a child is disabled from birth , so i have started a campaign to lower the age , i have contact the lords been some good news from them , been in local papers and about to go on daybreak t.v , please support me , my disabled daughter and all the other disabled children who need mobility to get them to meetings.
